com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting

Class ConditionalLength

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.ConditionalObject
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.ConditionalLength

  • public final class ConditionalLength
extends ConditionalObject
    Represents a conditional length used in DataBarCondition of a conditional formatting rule to specify data bar length.
    See Also:
    Excel Conditional Formatting example
